keyMoments.title: Crew's Shadows Return
keyMoments.description: Luffy, Zoro, Sanji, and Robin's shadows return to them just in time to save them from disintegration in the sunlight, allowing the crew to celebrate their victory.
keyMoments.significance: The crew is saved from the deadly consequences of shadow theft, marking the true completion of their victory over Moria.

keyMoments.title: World Government Orders Crew's Elimination
keyMoments.description: The World Government orders Bartholomew Kuma to eliminate all witnesses on Thriller Bark, specifically including the Straw Hat Pirates, to cover up Moria's defeat.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Government views the Straw Hats as a serious enough threat that they must be eliminated to protect the Warlords' reputation.

keyMoments.title: Crew Faces Kuma's Threat
keyMoments.description: The exhausted Straw Hat crew prepares to face Bartholomew Kuma's assault, with Zoro standing as the first line of defense despite their weakened condition.
keyMoments.significance: Tests the crew's resolve and loyalty as they must protect their unconscious captain against a powerful Warlord while at their limits.

reveals.information: The World Government considers the Straw Hats dangerous enough that they order their elimination to prevent word of Moria's defeat from spreading
